name: Alpha: Little War Online [MMORPG]
description:
Little War Online is an upcoming cross platform MMORPG. Featuring fast paced targetless combat. 100% Pixel Art game.

Pick a side in this great war story! Choose between the noble Draxian or the fierce Naru.

Explore a vast open world full with magic and mysteries to reveal. Meet new friends in your journey!

Soon available on Android, iOS, PC, OSX, Linux & Web. Subscribe for an early beta access.
